TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit VisualStateManager extends System.Windows.DependencyObject

summary.span: 管理控件的状态以及用于状态过渡的逻辑。

span.span: Manages states and the logic for transitioning between states for controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用于指定控件的外观，控件的状态时处于某种状态，并当控件更改状态。The enables you to specify states for a control, the appearance of a control when it is in a certain state, and when a control changes states. 例如，时它被按下或未按下时可能遇到略有不同的外观。For example, a might have a slightly different appearance when it is pressed than when it is not pressed. 两个指出定义对应于按下时 (`"Pressed"`)，它不是 (`"Normal"`)。Two states that the defines correspond to when it is pressed (`"Pressed"`) and when it is not (`"Normal"`). 控件处于状态时的外观由定义。The appearance of a control when it is in a state is defined by a . 一个包含一系列指定控件的外观时该控件处于该状态的更改的对象。A contains a collection of objects that specify how the control's appearance changes when the control is in that state. 通过设置，向控件添加可视状态`VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups`附加属性在控件上的。You add visual states to a control by setting the `VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups` attached property on the control. 每个包含一系列互相排斥的对象。Each contains a collection of objects that are mutually exclusive. 也就是说，控件将始终在一个在每个状态中。That is, the control is always in exactly one state of in each . 还可用于指定在控制进入特定状态。The also enables you to specify when a control enters a specific state. 若要更改状态而应调用的方法取决于你的方案。The method that you should call to change states depends on your scenario. 如果创建使用的控件在其，调用方法。If you create a control that uses the in its , call the method. 详细了解如何创建控件，使用，请参阅[创建控件具有可自定义外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md)。For more information about how to create controls that use the , see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md). 如果您使用之外(例如，如果您使用中或一个元素)，调用方法。If you use the outside of a (for example, if you use a in a or in a single element), call the method. 在任一情况下，执行所需相应地启动和停止与所涉及的状态相关联的情节提要的逻辑。In either case, the performs the logic that is required to appropriately start and stop the storyboards that are associated with the involved state. 例如，假设一个控件定义的状态，`State1`和`State2`，其中每个情节提要与它相关联。For example, suppose that a control defines the states, `State1` and `State2`, each of which has a storyboard associated with it. 如果控件处于`State1`并传递`State2`到或，则启动情节提要`State2`并停止在情节提要`State1`。If the control is in `State1` and you pass `State2` to or , the starts the storyboard in `State2` and stops the storyboard in `State1`. 附带的控件[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]使用更改可视状态。Controls that are included with [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] use the to change visual states. 当您创建附带的控件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]，可以添加到控件的对象处于某个特定状态指定控件的外观。When you create a for a control that is included with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], you can add objects to the control's to specify the control's appearance in a certain state. 若要查找附带的控件的可视状态名称[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]，请参阅[Control 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates.md)。To find the names of the visual states for the controls that are included with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], see [Control Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates.md). 定义控件的逻辑处理状态，因此不需要而不执行任何操作之间的过渡中的新对象。The control's logic handles transitioning between states, so you do not need to do anything other than define the objects in the new . 有关如何创建现有控件的控件模板的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about how to create control templates for existing controls, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 如果你想要实现您自己的逻辑用于状态过渡，则必须从，重写方法，并设置附加属性上使用自定义逻辑的控件。If you want to implement your own logic for transitioning between states, you must inherit from , override the method, and set the attached property on the control that uses the custom logic. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，并添加名为`CommonStates`到`VisualStateManager.VisualStatesGroups`附加属性。The following example creates a and adds a named `CommonStates` to the `VisualStateManager.VisualStatesGroups` attached property. 该示例定义了`MouseOver`并`Normal`中的对象`CommonStates` 。The example defines the `MouseOver` and `Normal` objects in the `CommonStates`. 当用户将鼠标指针移，它将从红色变为绿色 over 半秒。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the , it changes from red to green over one half second. 当用户移动鼠标离开矩形，立即更改回红色。When the user moves the mouse away from the rectangle, the immediately changes back to red. 请注意，`Normal`未定义状态。Note that the `Normal` state does not define a . 一个因为不需要时从过渡`MouseOver`状态变为`Normal`状态，有关`MouseOver`停止和属性返回为红色。A is not required because when the transitions from the `MouseOver` state to the `Normal` state, the for `MouseOver` is stopped and the property for the returns to red. [!code-xaml[VSMCustomControl#VSMNoTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/csharp/window1.xaml#vsmnotemplate)] 下面的示例演示在前面的示例和调用中定义的事件处理程序状态间转换的方法。The following example shows the event handler that is defined in the previous example and calls the method to transition between states. 上一示例中的矩形是否属于的一部分，该示例需要调用方法。If the rectangle in the previous example was part of a , the example would have to call the method. [!code-csharp[VSMCustomControl#GoToElementState](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#gotoelementstate)] [!code-vb[VSMCustomControl#GoToElementState](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#gotoelementstate)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在控件的状态间转换的 对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the object that transitions between the states of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`null`，则状态之间会使用转换逻辑。If is `null`, the uses its own logic to transition between states. 如果你想要实现您自己的逻辑用于状态过渡，创建一个类继承自并重写方法。If you want to implement your own logic for transitioning between states, create a class that inherits from and override the method. 若要使用自定义类，设置属性设置为自定义类型的对象。To use the custom class, set the property to an object of your custom type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用之外的元素的方法，以更改状态(例如，如果您使用中或)。Call the method to change states on an element outside of a (for example, if you use a in a or ). 调用方法，如果要更改使用的控件中的状态在其。Call the method if you are changing states in a control that uses the in its . ## Examples 以下示例创建的应用程序会提示用户猜测一个数字，介于 1 和 100 之间。The following example creates an application that prompts the user to guess a number between 1 and 100. 当用户输入一个数字时，该应用程序指示猜测是否过高、 过低，或正确。When the user enters a number, the application indicates whether the guess is too high, too low, or correct. 以下[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]创建应用程序的用户界面，并定义了 4 种状态： `TooLow`， `TooHigh`， `Correct`，和`Guessing`。The following [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] creates the user interface for the application and defines 4 states: `TooLow`, `TooHigh`, `Correct`, and `Guessing`. 应用程序开始时，它是在`Guessing`状态。When the application begins, it is in the `Guessing` state. .. [!code-xaml[VSMGoToElementState#GoToElementStateXaml](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmgotoelementstate/csharp/mainwindow.xaml#gotoelementstatexaml)] 下面的代码显示了应用程序的逻辑。The following code shows the logic of the application. 当用户输入一个数字，并单击按钮时，应用程序调用转换到`TooHigh`， `TooLow`，或`Correct`向用户猜测提供反馈。When the user enters a number and clicks the button, the application calls to transition to `TooHigh`, `TooLow`, or `Correct` to provide feedback to the user about the guess. 若要尝试此示例中，调用`GenerateNumber`方法时应用程序开始。To try this example, call the `GenerateNumber` method when the application begins. [!code-csharp[VSMGoToElementState#GoToElementStateCode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmgotoelementstate/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#gotoelementstatecode)] [!code-vb[VSMGoToElementState#GoToElementStateCode](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmgotoelementstate/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#gotoelementstatecode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法执行所需相应地启动和停止与转换相关联的情节提要的逻辑。The method performs the logic necessary to appropriately start and stop the storyboards that are associated with a transition. 当控件调用以更改其状态，执行以下操作：When a control calls to change its state, the does the following: - 首先，如果控件正在转换到具有，情节提要开始。First, if the that the control is transitioning to has a , the storyboard begins. 然后，如果来自该控件具有，情节提要结束。Then, if the that the control is coming from has a , the storyboard ends. - 如果控件已存在于`stateName`状态，不执行任何操作，并返回`true`。If the control is already in the `stateName` state, takes no action and returns `true`. - 如果`stateName`中不存在的`control`，不执行任何操作，并返回`false`。If `stateName` does not exist in the of `control`, takes no action and returns `false`. 您可以实现您自己用于状态过渡提供不同的逻辑。You can implement your own to provide different logic for transitioning between states. 例如，可以更改前面所述的逻辑，也可以提供自定义动画类型之间转换的逻辑。For example, you can change the logic described previously, or you can provide logic to transition between custom animation types. 若要实现，创建一个类继承自并重写方法。To implement a , create a class that inherits from and override the method. 若要使用自定义类，设置属性设置为自定义类型的对象。To use the custom class, set the property to an object of your custom type.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个包含一系列对象。Each contains a collection of objects. 一个包含一系列指定控件的外观时该控件处于某种状态的更改的对象。A contains a collection of objects that specify how the control's appearance changes when the control is in a certain state. 例如，时它被按下或未按下时可能遇到略有不同的外观。For example, a might have a slightly different appearance when it is pressed than when it is not pressed. 两个指出定义对应于按下时 (`"Pressed"`)，它不是 (`"Normal"`)。Two states that the defines correspond to when it is pressed (`"Pressed"`) and when it is not (`"Normal"`). 您将添加通过设置控制附加属性在控件上的。You add to a control by setting the attached property on the control. 您将放在彼此互相排斥中相同的状态。You put states that are mutually exclusive to each other in the same . 例如，具有两个对象。For example, the has two objects. 一个包含状态， `Normal`， `MouseOver`， `Pressed`，和`Disabled`。One contains the states, `Normal`, `MouseOver`, `Pressed`, and `Disabled`. 另一个包含状态`Checked`， `UnChecked`，和`Indeterminate`。The other contains the states, `Checked`, `UnChecked`, and `Indeterminate`. 可以有状态`MouseOver`并`UnChecked`时相同，但它不能为`MouseOver`和`Pressed`在同一时间的状态。The can be in states `MouseOver` and `UnChecked` at the same time, but it cannot be in the `MouseOver` and `Pressed` states at the same time. 尽管您可以添加对象中的任何元素，它们是特别有用的方法来让其他人能够重新定义的可视行为。Although you can add objects to any element, they are a particularly useful way to enable others to redefine the visual behavior of a . 如果创建使用的自定义控件，可以指定哪些状态控件可以是在通过添加上其类定义。If you create a custom control that uses a , you can specify which states that control can be in by adding a on its class definition. 然后创建一个新的人为您的控件可以添加到模板的对象。Then anyone who creates a new for your control can add objects to the template. 具有相同的状态属于同一个。States with the same belong in the same . 有关如何使用详细信息中的对象，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about how to use objects in a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 详细了解如何创建控件，使用，请参阅[创建控件具有可自定义外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md)。For more information about how to create controls that use the , see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个简单有关，其中包含一个。The following example creates a simple for a that contains one . 它还包含名为`CommonStates`，用于定义`MouseOver`和`Normal`状态。It also contains a named `CommonStates`, which defines the `MouseOver` and `Normal` states. 还有，它指定，它将在半秒当用户将鼠标指针移到从绿色更改为红色。The also has a that specifies that it takes one half second for the to change from green to red when the user moves the mouse pointer over the . [!code-xaml[VSMButtonTemplate#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmbuttontemplate/csharp/window1.xaml#11)]
